verbs.description: [ARG1: The Singapore summit] [V: was] [ARG2: quintessentially Trumpian – a made - for - TV spectacular , long on red - carpet pageantry and short on substance] .
The Singapore summit was quintessentially Trumpian – a [V: made] - [ARG1: for] - [ARG1: TV] spectacular , long on red - carpet pageantry and short on substance .
